name: WASD is for losers
description:
TO MOVE: Input the rotation degrees, enter, and your ship will follow 

Example: 270, ENTER

This was made in less than 2 days for the Kenney Game Jam so the assets don't belong to me. I'm not really happy with the final results it looks a bit off to me but I have to sleep it's 3 in the morning. Hope you have fun with it !!
